alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 1:23PM EDT until April 27 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1223 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Panama City Beach, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Ebro, Southport, Seminole Hills, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City, Camp Flowers, Bahama Beach, Sunnyside, Brannonville, Vicksburg, Majette, Bayhead, West Bay, Inlet Beach and Gulf Lagoon Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
